meanings.definition: Not improved or renovated, especially in a way that conforms to middle-class taste.
meanings.sent1: The old, ungentrified building stood out among the modern structures.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood remained ungentrified despite the new cafes opening up.
meanings.sent3: It's like the ungentrified house is stuck in a time warp!
meanings.sent4: The abandoned amusement park had an eerie, ungentrified charm.
meanings.sent5: The ungentrified alleyway was dark and mysterious, untouched by change.

meanings.definition: Not gentrified; not made more appealing to the middle class.
meanings.sent1: The ungentrified area retained its original character and authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The street art in the ungentrified district reflected the local culture.
meanings.sent3: Living in an ungentrified neighborhood has its own unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The ungentrified market bustled with activity, untouched by trendy cafes.
meanings.sent5: The ungentrified part of town felt like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
